recipesJson.name: KILLER BEARS ON MANGOü•≠
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: A commercial version of an old mango recipe brought back to life with the addition of Wonder flavors peach gummy candy and island mango it's sweet and flavorfull and candyish works well with tanks and duel coil rda's this is in your face mango could work well with high nicotine salts for a pod system..ü•≠üêª
